Articles.Content:
The game crashes whenever I'm loading my space station.

Heres the errpr report: Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.2f1_9abb1b59b47c]

You are using x64, which is known to be horribly broken and do things like this if you exceed 4gb of memory usage. It appears that you are using ~9gb in the log, are you running with mods or is that just a result of other applications being open?

It's also possible your ship is corrupted. Were you having any other issues before this?

~Claw

It's also possible your ship is corrupted. Were you having any other issues before this?

~Claw

Just random crashes and whatnot but now it won't load this ship at all. It isn't a mod issue. The station is completely stock parts

You are using x64, which is known to be horribly broken and do things like this if you exceed 4gb of memory usage. It appears that you are using ~9gb in the log, are you running with mods or is that just a result of other applications being open?

I'm running with mods but the station is completely stock parts.

I'm running with mods but the station is completely stock parts.

The x64 crashes are rather unpredictable, if your mods are using a lot of memory, something like loading a craft could very easily trigger it.

I on't see how you're using ~9GB of memory when I have 88 MODS(about 65 have at least 10 parts in them) and I only use 5.5GB. I do get the same crash, however I have yet to do a texture reduction(minor, because major ruins the game) on my Kerbal Space Program install.
